type.name: Effect
type.summary: Represents a custom effect based on a Magic Effect.

property.name: Area
property.summary: Gets or sets the radius of the area covered with this Effect.

property.name: BaseEffect
property.summary: Gets or sets the base Magic Effect of this Effect.

property.name: Conditions
property.summary: Gets or sets the contaning Conditions that detemine when this Effect is active.

property.name: Duration
property.summary: Gets or sets the duration of this Effect.

property.name: Magnitude
property.summary: Gets or sets the magnitude of this Effect.

type.remarks: New effects can be created using the helper method Engine.CreateEffect(). When a new custom effect has been created, conditions can be added to it, if desired. And finally, the new effect can be added to an associated with the Target form.
